openIndexer

void openIndexer(boolean reWrite)
Open indexer. If parameter is true then delete index repository and create a new else all content will be added to the existed repository.

void updateIndex(Content content)
Update the indexed content with the new one. Two content is equals if theirs URI fields are same.
